sentence.romaji: kaigi ha shiasate ni enki sareta
sentence.english: The meeting was postponed to three days from today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sousai

sentence.kanji: あの人は日本銀行の総裁です。
sentence.romaji: ano hito ha niponginkou no sousai desu
sentence.english: That person is the president of the Bank of Japan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuuryou

sentence.kanji: コンサートは夜7時5分に終了しました。
sentence.romaji: konsa-to ha yoru shichi ji go fun ni shuuryou shimashita
sentence.english: The concert ended at 7:05 pm.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's osameru

sentence.kanji: 自動車税を納めたよ。
sentence.romaji: jidoushazei wo osameta yo
sentence.english: I paid my car tax.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's natoku

sentence.kanji: 彼の説明で納得できました。
sentence.romaji: kare no setsumei de natoku dekimashita
sentence.english: I was able to accept his explanation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keizoku

sentence.kanji: ものごとは根気よく継続することが大切です。
sentence.romaji: mono goto ha konki yoku keizoku suru koto ga taisetsu desu
sentence.english: When doing anything, it's important to keep at it persistently.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koukyuu

sentence.kanji: 私たちは高級ホテルに泊まったの。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha koukyuu hoteru ni tomata no
sentence.english: We stayed at a high class hotel.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuu

sentence.kanji: 彼は書道3級です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shodou sankyuu desu
sentence.english: He has a class three certificate in Japanese calligraphy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's joukyuu

sentence.kanji: 彼は上級のコースに上がったよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha joukyuu no ko-su ni agata yo
sentence.english: He went up to the advanced course.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shokyuu

sentence.kanji: これは初級の教科書です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha shokyuu no kyoukasho desu 。
sentence.english: This is a beginner's textbook.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuukyuu

sentence.kanji: 彼は中級レベルの日本語を習っています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha chuukyuu reberu no nihongo wo narate imasu
sentence.english: He's learning intermediate-level Japanese.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyokusen

sentence.kanji: この道は、ゆるい曲線を描いているよ。
sentence.romaji: kono michi ha yurui kyokusen wo egaite iru yo
sentence.english: This road curves gently.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aburae

sentence.kanji: 趣味で油絵を描いています。
sentence.romaji: shumi de aburae wo kaiteimasu
sentence.english: I paint oil paintings for fun.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chokusen

sentence.kanji: 直線を描いてください。
sentence.romaji: chokusen wo kaite kudasai
sentence.english: Please draw a straight line.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouhan

sentence.kanji: ドラマの後半は来週放送されるんだ。
sentence.romaji: dorama no kouhan ha raishuu housou sareru n da
sentence.english: The second half of the drama will be broadcast next week.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuukei

sentence.kanji: 京都から中継で放送しています。
sentence.romaji: kyouto kara chuukei de housou shite imasu
sentence.english: We're broadcasting from Kyoto.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atokatazuke

sentence.kanji: 食事の後片付けを手伝ったの。
sentence.romaji: shokuji no atokatazuke wo tetsudata no
sentence.english: I helped to clean up after the meal.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dentou

sentence.kanji: 私は日本の伝統を大切にします。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha nipon no dentou wo taisetsu ni shimasu
sentence.english: I value the traditions of Japan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ushiromuki

sentence.kanji: 彼は車を後ろ向きに駐車したの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kuruma wo ushiromuki ni chuusha shita no
sentence.english: He parked the car backwards.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's torishimari

sentence.kanji: 違法駐車の取り締まりが厳しくなったの。
sentence.romaji: ihou chuusha no torishimari ga kibishiku nata no
sentence.english: The regulation of illegal parking has become stricter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinkyuu

sentence.kanji: 緊急事態が発生した。
sentence.romaji: kinkyuu jitai ga hasei shita
sentence.english: An emergency situation arose.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kunren

sentence.kanji: 学校で避難訓練がありました。
sentence.romaji: gakou de hinan kunren ga arimashita
sentence.english: There was a fire drill at the school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryokakuki

sentence.kanji: 旅客機が墜落したよ。
sentence.romaji: ryokakuki ga tsuiraku shita yo
sentence.english: The passenger jet crashed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keiretsu

sentence.kanji: 高校卒業後、系列の大学に進みました。
sentence.romaji: koukou sotsugyou go keiretsu no daigaku ni susumimashita
sentence.english: After graduating from high school, he entered an affiliated university.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keitou

sentence.kanji: 電気系統を図面で確かめました。
sentence.romaji: denki keitou wo zumen de tashikamemashita
sentence.english: I checked the electrical system on the diagram.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taikei

sentence.kanji: 勤務の体系を見直すことにしました。
sentence.romaji: kinmu no taikei wo minaosu koto ni shimashita
sentence.english: We've decided to review the work system.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rikei

sentence.kanji: 彼は理系の学生です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha rikei no gakusei desu
sentence.english: He's a science student.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shison

sentence.kanji: 彼は織田信長の子孫だよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha odanobunaga no shison da yo
sentence.english: He is a descendant of Oda Nobunaga.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinu

sentence.kanji: このシャツは絹でできています。
sentence.romaji: kono shatsu ha kinu de dekite imasu
sentence.english: This shirt is made of silk.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's men

sentence.kanji: 私は綿のシャツをよく着ます。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha men no shatsu wo yoku kimasu
sentence.english: I often wear cotton shirts.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iji

sentence.kanji: 彼女は何とか健康を維持しているわね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha nantoka kenkou wo iji shite iru wa ne
sentence.english: Somehow, she manages to keep healthy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinshi

sentence.kanji: 身なりのいい紳士が話しかけてきたの。
sentence.romaji: minari no ii shinshi ga hanashikakete kita no
sentence.english: A well-dressed gentleman spoke to me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanei

sentence.kanji: あの国は経済的に繁栄しているわね。
sentence.romaji: ano kuni ha keizaiteki ni hanei shite iru wa ne
sentence.english: That country is prospering economically.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakeru

sentence.kanji: 彼は仕事に命を懸けているの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shigoto ni inochi wo kaketeiru no 。
sentence.english: He risks his life in his job.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's musubu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は髪にリボンを結んだね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kami ni ribon wo musunda ne
sentence.english: She tied a ribbon in her hair.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's osanai

sentence.kanji: 彼女には幼い息子がいます。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ni ha osanai musuko ga imasu
sentence.english: She has a little son.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youji

sentence.kanji: 幼児は入場無料です。
sentence.romaji: youji ha nyuujou muryou desu
sentence.english: Small children are admitted free of charge.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nigirishimeru

sentence.kanji: 彼は両手を握り締めたの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ryoute wo nigirishimeta no
sentence.english: He clenched his fists.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ikura

sentence.kanji: 幾ら呼んでも彼は返事をしなかったわ。
sentence.romaji: ikura yonde mo kare ha henji wo shinakata wa
sentence.english: No matter how many times I called, he didn't respond.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koukai

sentence.kanji: 後悔しても、しょうがない。
sentence.romaji: koukai shite mo shouganai
sentence.english: There is no point in regretting the past.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's souridaijin

sentence.kanji: 国民の6割が総理大臣を支持しています。
sentence.romaji: kokumin no 6 wari ga souridaijin wo shiji shite imasu
sentence.english: 60 percent of the people support the Prime Minister.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youchi

sentence.kanji: その考えは少し幼稚だと思う。
sentence.romaji: sono kangae ha sukoshi youchi da to omou
sentence.english: I think that idea's a bit childish.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keshou

sentence.kanji: 雪の結晶にはいろいろな形があります。
sentence.romaji: yuki no keshou ni ha iroiro na katachi ga arimasu
sentence.english: Snow crystals come in a variety of shapes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's senro

sentence.kanji: 子猫が線路に迷い込んだぞ。
sentence.romaji: koneko ga senro ni mayoikonda zo
sentence.english: The kitten strayed onto the railway track.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nawa

sentence.kanji: 枝を縄でしばったよ。
sentence.romaji: eda wo nawa de shibata yo
sentence.english: I bound the branch with the rope.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shibaru

sentence.kanji: 古新聞をひもで縛ったよ。
sentence.romaji: furushinbun wo himo de shibata yo 。
sentence.english: I tied up the old newspapers with string.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiboru

sentence.kanji: 布をもっと固く絞りなさい。
sentence.romaji: nuno wo moto kataku shiborinasai
sentence.english: Squeeze the cloth harder.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouyou

sentence.kanji: この山は紅葉がとても美しい。
sentence.romaji: kono yama ha kouyou ga totemo utsukushii
sentence.english: The autumn leaves on this mountain are very beautiful.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuchibeni

sentence.kanji: 赤い口紅を買いました。
sentence.romaji: akai kuchibeni wo kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought some red lipstick.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ami

sentence.kanji: 少年は網でその蝶を捕まえた。
sentence.romaji: shounen ha ami de sono chou wo tsukamaeta
sentence.english: The boy captured the butterfly with the net.
